headline: Oceania Cruises® Unveils Dramatically Evolved Suites for Oceania Sonata™
summary: Oceania Cruises®, the world's leading culinary- and destination-focused luxury cruise line, unveils lavishly reimagined and newly designed suite accommodations aboard Oceania Sonata, the first ship in the highly anticipated Sonata Class, debuting August 2027. Designed with the modern luxury traveler in mind, Oceania Sonata will offer a greater variety and number of suites, with 33% of accommodations dedicated to suites.
